answer:
Adults who were immunized against tetanus and diphtheria when they were younger should get a booster dose of the tetanus and diphtheria (Td) vaccine every 10 years. This booster dose strengthens or boosts the immune system to give better protection against these diseases.
- Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## Adults who were immunized against tetanus and diphtheria when they were younger should get a booster dose of the tetanus and diphtheria (Td) vaccine every 10 years.

This booster dose strengthens or boosts the immune system to give better protection against these diseases.
- Immunization Nurse
